common.welcomeDescription: Your comprehensive knowledge base for everything related to Afina DAO
common.noSearchResults: No articles found for your query
common.articleNotFoundDescription: The article you are looking for does not exist or has been deleted.

about.title: About Afina DAO
about.description: Information about Afina DAO decentralized autonomous organization

header.title: About Afina DAO
header.subtitle: Comprehensive support for crypto projects with full control and process stability

services.title: Our Services
services.description1: Afina DAO provides comprehensive support for crypto projects. Our clients choose a project, and for a fixed monthly fee, it is managed on our servers until TGE.
services.description2: We work with testnets, mainnets, and other crypto activities, ensuring full control and process stability.

security.title: Security is our priority
security.point1: Only Afina DAO team members have access to wallets.
security.point2: An insurance fund has been created for unforeseen situations.
security.point3: After cooperation ends, all client data is completely deleted from our servers.

responsibilities.title: Areas of Responsibility
responsibilities.note: Server access is strictly limited and provided only to Afina DAO specialists.

contact.title: Join Us
contact.subtitle: Become part of the revolution in automation and decentralized technologies

pricingPage.title: Pricing Calculator
pricingPage.description: Specify the number of accounts and projects to calculate the cost of using the platform
pricingPage.firstMonthInfo: First month: includes installation cost ($100 per project) + monthly subscription
pricingPage.subsequentMonthsInfo: Subsequent months: only monthly subscription without installation cost
pricingPage.discountsInfo: Discounts: automatically applied when the number of projects increases
pricingPage.newProjectsInfo: New projects: when adding a new project, an additional installation fee ($100) is charged
pricingPage.specifyParameters: Specify parameters to calculate the cost
